name: Augmented

skills.name: Harder
skills.shortDescription: Automatically reduce damage by one step.
skills.longDescription: You resist damage as a Vehicle would: Incoming damage is reduced by one step before you Brace for Impact, unless that damage has Penetrating or Breaching

skills.name: Better
skills.shortDescription: Support two additional Cybernetic Mods.
skills.longDescription: Your body can support two additional cybernetic Mods. You gain two free cybermods if this Skill was chosen during character creation.

skills.name: Faster
skills.shortDescription: Perform extreme acts of acrobatics and flexibility.
skills.longDescription: Your run speed and reaction time are incredibly fast. You can include extreme acts of acrobatics, reflexes, and/or flexibility in your Moves (quickdrawing weapons, catching bullets, running up walls, outrunning explosions, sprinting on water, etc.).

skills.name: Stronger
skills.shortDescription: Destructive, Impacting and Penetrating strikes.
skills.longDescription: Your unarmed and melee attacks are Destructive, Impact, and Penetrating.

skills.name: Technologic
skills.shortDescription: Establish wireless mental connections.
skills.longDescription: You can establish a wireless mental connection to any computer system within line of sight. Open and Accessed systems remain connected to you as long as you are within signal range.

workspace.name: Powered
workspace.description: A powerful generator or backup system. Converts fuel into power, can recharge batteries and energy cells.

workspace.name: Collector
workspace.description: Tools and machinery designed to gather a specific type of fuel into appropriate storage units.

advancement: An old wound causes new pain.

skills.name: Pact
skills.shortDescription: Your deity is a Faction, prayers call in Favors.
skills.longDescription: Create a Faction consisting of just your deity. You gain 1 Favor and 3 Debt with it. You communicate with your deity through prayer and can call in Favors. Your deity makes demands and calls in your Debts through dreams and prophecy.

skills.name: Lay On Hands
skills.shortDescription: Patch Up takes only a touch and word.
skills.longDescription: Your Patch Up takes only a few seconds. You do not need tools or materials to perform a Patch Up, just a touch and a word.

skills.name: Wisdom
skills.shortDescription: Peace, quiet, enlightenment, and introspection.
skills.longDescription:
When you are in Cramped Quarters with yourself or another, choose any number of the following:
- Peace: Each participant recovers from a minor debility.
- Quiet: Get Involved has no effect on the Cramped Quarters.
- Enlightenment: Do not roll, simply use the 7-9 result.
- Introspection: Each participant may change their XP trigger.

skills.name: Relic
skills.shortDescription: Gain a sacred Class 3 melee weapon.
skills.longDescription:
Create a Class 3 melee weapon. Choose one:
- It is a symbol of your order.
- It is a sign of your greatness.
- It is feared and reviled.
A Relic is almost indestructible. If you become separated, you always have a vague, painful sense of where it is.

skills.name: Inscribe
skills.shortDescription: Add an Attire upgrade to a person or Attire.
skills.longDescription: When you perform a Patch Up using a Ritual Kit, you can very temporarily add an Attire upgrade to a person or set of Attire.

workspace.name: Ceremonial
workspace.description: An elaborate, gaudy space, covered in trappings of religious and/or spiritual significance, suitable for religious celebrations.

workspace.name: Holy
workspace.description: A peaceful, austere space wholly dedicated to a greater being or spiritual force. A place of quiet contemplation and prayer.

name: Consul

skills.name: Trinkets
skills.shortDescription: Free Class 1 Cargo from foreign societies.
skills.longDescription: Whenever you successfully engage a foreign society (visit, experience, infiltrate, attack, etc.), gain a Class 1 Cargo of miscellaneous baubles, trinkets, and other cultural detritus.

skills.name: Linguist
skills.shortDescription: Read, write, and speak almost all languages.
skills.longDescription: You can communicate passably in the languages of all known societies and species. A successful Assessment of a newly-encountered or long-dead culture grants you permanent access to their written and/or spoken language.

skills.name: Adaptive
skills.shortDescription: Use alien tools and equipment, eat their food.
skills.longDescription: You can partake of all the most exotic consumables (food, drink, narcotics, etc.) avoiding those that are poisonous to your species. You can use machinery, games, devices, vehicles, tools, equipment, and weapons not designed for your species.

skills.name: Advice
skills.shortDescription: Steer someone towards a decision or desire.
skills.longDescription: When you steer someone towards a decision or desire, Roll+Influence. On a 10+, they readily accept your advice and will act on it if they can. On a 7-9, they’re cautious, conflicted or confused. They need time before they’re ready to act.

skills.name: Mediate
skills.shortDescription: Inform, escalate, or defuse an argument.
skills.longDescription:
When you successfully interfere or Get Involved in an interpersonal situation (including Cramped Quarters), choose 1:
- Each participant gains a Data Point about another participant.
- Escalate the situation. The choices are now Fight or Flight. 
- Defuse the situation. Violence is currently not an option.

workspace.name: Habitat
workspace.description: Highly controlled, sealed space. Mimics natural habitats or planetary environments. Self-contained life support, gravity simulators, and so on.

workspace.name: Culinary
workspace.description: Designed to produce and serve food, either providing a wide variety of dishes, or tailored to a specific species or culture.

advancement: An abuse of power is resisted.
A taste of exotica is enjoyed.
A voice is no longer silenced.

name: Fanatic

skills.name: Bravery
skills.shortDescription: You and your Crew are fearless.
skills.longDescription: You feel no terror, revulsion or hopelessness. You never have to Face Adversity to overcome emotions. Any Crew you Command is Fearless.

skills.name: Nemesis
skills.shortDescription: Gain a Data Point about the cause of a failure.
skills.longDescription: Whenever you fail a Move, declare who or what caused you to fail. You gain a Data Point about that subject.

skills.name: Obsession
skills.shortDescription: Data Points are always about this subject.
skills.longDescription: Choose the subject of your Obsession. When you would gain a Data Point about a tangentially related subject, gain a Data Point about your Obsession instead.

skills.name: Terrify
skills.shortDescription: Roll +Influence or Physique to terrify others.
skills.longDescription: When your presence becomes known, Roll+Influence or +Physique. On a 10+, people are meek and respectful. On a 7-9, people are cautious and worried. On a 6-, people are panicked and hostile.

skills.name: Martyr
skills.shortDescription: Interpose yourself and suffer harm instead.
skills.longDescription: When a nearby victim would suffer harm or consequences, you may interpose yourself and Roll+Mettle. On a 10+, they are protected, and you suffer a lesser consequence. On a 7-9, you suffer instead of them. On a 6-, you share in their suffering.

workspace.name: Discipline
workspace.description: Secure, private, sound-proofed confines. Provides extreme mental and physical conditioning, exertion, torture, or self-punishment.

workspace.name: Shrine
workspace.description: A deeply personal space entirely devoted to your obsession, filled with samples, inspirations, trinkets and memorabilia.

advancement: An opponent is shown the error of their ways.
A problem is purged by fire.
A fear proves to be justified.
A hero suffers for their cause.

name: Kinetic

skills.name: Telekinesis
skills.shortDescription: Project physical actions at a short distance.
skills.longDescription: You can project physical actions over a short distance (interact, carry, punch, etc.), using the appropriate +Stats as if you were physically there.

skills.name: Launch
skills.shortDescription: Throw objects with +Mettle or +Physique.
skills.longDescription: You can propel small, inanimate objects with deadly speed and precision using +Mettle. Large, oddly shaped or defiant subjects (small vehicles, people) tend to be clumsier projectiles, and are propelled with +Physique.

skills.name: Barrier
skills.shortDescription: Create a barrier with your +Mettle.
skills.longDescription: You can project a flat or hemispherical barrier of force that deflects or resists impacts, leveraging your +Mettle as a manifestation of solid willpower. This is extremely encumbering; you will be Clumsy while maintaining it.

skills.name: Animate
skills.shortDescription: A collection of objects becomes a Class 1 Crew.
skills.longDescription: Choose a collection of objects. Those objects become a Class 1 Artificial Crew (see page 101) with an upgrade that matches the materials used. You can only have one Animated Crew at a time.

skills.name: Flight
skills.shortDescription: You can glide, soar, and hover.
skills.longDescription: You can soar, glide, and hover in midair.

workspace.name: Arena
workspace.description: Open area designed for physical activity. Contains protective measures and equipment appropriate to the activity.

workspace.name: Shielded
workspace.description: A workspace designed to either provide a force field or augment existing defenses. Creates barriers between or within other workspaces.

advancement: A single pebble causes a landslide.
A plan is thwarted by gravity.

skills.name: Telepathy
skills.shortDescription: Communicate mentally and sense life force.
skills.longDescription:
With a moment of focus, you can: 
- Communicate mentally with someone within line of sight. 
- Communicate mentally with someone you know well. 
- Sense the general life force, health, and emotional state of everyone within a given area.

skills.name: Probe
skills.shortDescription: Access people’s heads as if they were computers.
skills.longDescription: Grasping the head of another being allows you to forcefully Access their mind (with +Interface), exactly as if it was a computer system.

skills.name: Compel
skills.shortDescription: Give a Command that cannot be refused.
skills.longDescription:
You can Command any group or individual, no matter their disposition, no matter the command. On a 10+, choose 1 consequence. On a 7-9, choose 2 consequences. 
- They only obey non-harmful parts of your command. 
- They are stilted, clumsy, and obviously controlled. 
- You suffer a mental or emotional debility as backlash.

skills.name: Precognition
skills.shortDescription: Suffer minor mental harm, reroll a Move.
skills.longDescription: If your mind is clear, you may suffer a minor mental debility (headache, nausea, vertigo, etc.) to declare that a roll you just made was merely a glimpse of possible future. Briefly describe the immediate or long-term consequences of that future, then reroll.

skills.name: Clairvoyance
skills.shortDescription: +Mettle Assessment over any distance.
skills.longDescription: Meditation allows you to use your +Mettle to make Assessment about specific people, objects, and locations over any distance. The glimpses granted by a failed Clairvoyance can be extremely disturbing.

workspace.name: Tranquil
workspace.description: A peaceful, austere, quiet space, suitable for meditation and deep thought. Simple decorations and few distractions.

workspace.name: Nullified
workspace.description: Sound absorbing, featureless, with full light control. Cancels and suppresses weak forms of psionic and supernatural energies.

name: Shaper

skills.name: Teleport
skills.shortDescription: Move instantly to a location you see or know.
skills.longDescription:
You can instantly move yourself and nearby targets across any distance, using +Mettle to overcome potential adversity, if you either: 
- See your destination clearly. 
- Know the destination intimately. 
- Don’t care where you end up, as long as it’s Not Here.

skills.name: Regenerate
skills.shortDescription: Reduce injury severity, regrow limbs.
skills.longDescription: A moment of stillness allows you to reduce the severity of one of your injuries by one step, if available. This can regrow limbs/organs lost to Critical Injuries, and happens while you are dead.

skills.name: Evoke
skills.shortDescription: Create fire, frost, lightning, light, and darkness.
skills.longDescription: Each time you Evoke the elements, choose between Fire, Frost, Lightning, Darkness, and Light. You may create and manipulate that element as part of any Move or Skill. You may wield it as a weapon when you Launch Assault or Open Fire. You may only Evoke one element at a time.

skills.name: Alchemy
skills.shortDescription: Patch Up can corrupt, cleanse or transmute.
skills.longDescription: When using a Ritual Kit to Patch Up a person, object, or material, choose from this list instead of the standard Patch Up: Spread rust, rot, or erosion. Purify, clean, and rejuvenate. Transmute one material into another.

skills.name: Transform
skills.shortDescription: Take on the form of what you studied.
skills.longDescription:
You can take on the form and bodily capabilities of a physical subject up to three times bigger or smaller than you… 
- Immediately after an Assessment of the subject. 
- At any time by spending a Data Point about the subject.
You can return to your original form at any time. Assuming a shape larger than the available area is a bad idea.

workspace.name: Mystic
workspace.description: Full of ancient tomes, curios, and baubles. Equipped for magical study and experimentation. Marked with runes of protection and binding. Cannot be entered or exited by supernatural beings, unless allowed.

workspace.name: Elemental
workspace.description: Tied to a specific element (fire, frost, lightning, light or darkness). Generates and/or contains that element.

advancement: An environment shifts to suit one’s needs.
A step is taken between two worlds.

name: Academic

skills.name: Education
skills.shortDescription: When you gain a Data Point, share it with your allies.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Expertise to create antidote, drug, poison, etc.

skills.name: Surgery
skills.shortDescription: Your Patch Up treats critical injuries, installs cybernetics.

skills.name: Deduction
skills.shortDescription: Discover vulnerabilities, dangers, or causes.

skills.name: Technobabble
skills.shortDescription: Command grants technical knowledge, uses +Expertise.

workspace.name: Medical
workspace.description: Sterile environment. Medbay, cryotubes, surgical servo arms, isolation chamber, recovery ward.

workspace.name: Research
workspace.description: Sensors gather scientific readings. Laboratory, containment units, sample scanners, sealed storage.

advancement: A life is saved or destroyed by science.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.shortDescription: Vanish while unobserved, then show up at any point.

skills.name: Sabotage
skills.shortDescription: Roll+[Stat] to cause plans, machines, situations to fail.

skills.name: Assassination
skills.shortDescription: A 10+ Roll that kills someone leaves no evidence.

skills.name: Surveillance
skills.shortDescription: After an Access, you can continually track that person.

skills.name: Interrogation
skills.shortDescription: Gain 3 Data Points about someone at your mercy.

workspace.name: Stealthy
workspace.description: Difficult to detect, high tech camouflage, cloaking or concealment. Scanning bafflers, sound dampening, hidden doors/rooms.

workspace.name: Secure
workspace.description: Sensors to track people and movement. Security cameras, monitoring stations, holding cells, security doors.

skills.name: Outfit
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom-designed Class 3 Attire.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.shortDescription: Immediately find Elite, Secretive, or Motivated markets.

skills.name: Acumen
skills.shortDescription: Find what to exploit, what’s in demand, or who’s in charge.

skills.name: Luxury
skills.shortDescription: Lavish lifestyle. Gain an NPC retainer (butler, consort, etc.).

skills.name: Bribe
skills.shortDescription: Acquisition makes political, legal and diplomatic purchases.

workspace.name: Mercantile
workspace.description: Prominent advertisement, easy access. Large cargo storage space, automatic loader-unloader systems.

workspace.name: Leisure
workspace.description: Relaxing, inviting, well-lit. Studio, lounge, entertainment systems, recreation area.

name: Explorer

skills.name: Boldly Go
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Mettle, find something profitable, useful, or awesome.

skills.name: Reconnaissance
skills.shortDescription: Wilderness Assessments gain 3 data points on success.

skills.name: Survival
skills.shortDescription: Scrounge up food, medicine, wilderness kits, melee weapons.

skills.name: Recklessness
skills.shortDescription: Roll 1d6, 50/50 chance of huge success or abject failure.

skills.name: Custom Vehicle
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom-designed Class 3 Land Vehicle.

workspace.name: Rugged
workspace.description: Withstands harsh climates and weather. Decontamination units, hydroponics facilities, advanced water/air/waste recyclers, self-sufficient.

workspace.name: Survey
workspace.description: Planetary scanners (weather, geological activity, etc). Probe launcher, topography holo-projector, motor-pool.

advancement: A needed item is scrounged up.
A ludicrous stunt turns the tides.

name: Industrial

skills.name: Repair
skills.shortDescription: Your Patch Up repairs critical breakages, rebuilds machines.

skills.name: Construction
skills.shortDescription: Build shelters, defenses, concealment or workspaces.

skills.name: Tinker
skills.shortDescription: Assemble shoddy weapons, explosives and engineering kits.

skills.name: Upgrade
skills.shortDescription: Add an extra upgrade to a weapon or vehicle.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Physique to dismantle something quickly, quietly, etc.

workspace.name: Refinery
workspace.description: Heavy raw-material collectors. Gathers, processes raw matter into refined materials. Material storage tanks.

workspace.name: Manufactory
workspace.description: Engineering bays. Builds, upgrades and repairs. Workbenches, tool racks, winches, pulleys, lifts.

advancement: A piece of junk proves pivotal.

name: Military

skills.name: Tactics
skills.shortDescription: You choose the consequences of Launch Assault/Open Fire.

skills.name: Toughness
skills.shortDescription: You can suffer two injuries of each severity.

skills.name: Unique Weapon
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom Class 3 Firearm or Heavy Weapon.

skills.name: Heavy Lifting
skills.shortDescription: Ignore Clumsy caused by heavy weights.

skills.name: Authority
skills.shortDescription: Commands given while in power override loyalty.

workspace.name: Armored
workspace.description: Made of reinforced materials. Difficult to damage, can withstand direct impacts and explosions. Reinforced blast doors, structurally sound.

workspace.name: Barracks
workspace.description: Efficient, defensible, practical. Berthing for many soldiers, lockers, gym, training ring, mobilization area.

advancement: An objective is taken by force.
A problem is resolved with firepower.

name: Personality

skills.name: Fame
skills.shortDescription: People know you/your work. Allies can use your +Influence.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.shortDescription: Gain a hand-picked Class 3 Crew.

skills.name: Contacts
skills.shortDescription: Introduce a new NPC whenever you go anywhere civilized.

skills.name: Inspiration
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Influence or +Physique to spread an emotion.

skills.name: Diplomacy
skills.shortDescription: Calling in a Favor will never be denied or prevented.

workspace.name: Habitation
workspace.description: Living space for many guests or crew. Communal eating rooms, extended life-support/facilities.

workspace.name: Stately
workspace.description: Expensive, luxurious, finely appointed décor. More expensive to maintain, but provides much higher quality of life.

advancement: A statement starts or ends a fight.

skills.name: Criminal
skills.shortDescription: Crimes that roll 10+ leave no evidence.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Mettle to kill, injure, rob, or capture a victim.

skills.name: Scapegoat
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Expertise to redirect social/legal/financial harm.

skills.name: False Identity
skills.shortDescription: Maintain fake identities, cannot incur Debt or Favor.

skills.name: Addict
skills.shortDescription: Choose a stat. Gain an extra +1, or -2 if you can’t get drugs.

workspace.name: Facade
workspace.description: False identification/registry, disguised as something else. Crawlspaces, hidden compartments, false walls.

workspace.name: Sleazy
workspace.description: Ramshackle, grimy, dimly lit. Space for drinking, smoking, recreational drug use, or other vices.

name: Starfarer

skills.name: Weightless
skills.shortDescription: Ignore the Clumsy trait while flying, falling, or in zero-G.

skills.name: Cosmopolitan
skills.shortDescription: Successful cultural Assessments grant 3 Data Points.

skills.name: Navigation
skills.shortDescription: Plan voyages that are fast, safe, pleasant, or profitable.

skills.name: Calibrations
skills.shortDescription: Get Involved+Interface to prepare a vehicle/console.

skills.name: Custom Flyer
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom-designed Class 3 Flyer.

workspace.name: Navigation
workspace.description: Wide bay windows, observation decks, star-charts, holo-screens. Satellite uplinks, orbital tracking systems, airspace control/coordination tower.

workspace.name: Launchpad
workspace.description: Aircraft/shuttle hangar with wide bay doors, launchpads for shuttles and speeders.

advancement: A piloting maneuver causes a reversal.
A system is pushed to the limit.

name: Technocrat

skills.name: Upload
skills.shortDescription: Spend a Data Point to erase, spread, or alter facts about it.

skills.name: Hijack
skills.shortDescription: Access locks out everyone else.

skills.name: Program
skills.shortDescription: After Accessing a system, choose a behavior and a trigger.

skills.name: Network
skills.shortDescription: Track, Get Involved, and issue Commands remotely.

skills.name: Artificial Intelligence
skills.shortDescription: Gain a loyal AI NPC that can inhabit systems.

workspace.name: Communication
workspace.description: High-powered communications array, transceivers, antennae. Screens, conference rooms, holo-projectors.

workspace.name: Observer
workspace.description: Advanced, multi-band sensors, capable of long-distance scans. Probe launchers. Recording equipment, shielded data storage.

advancement: A solution is found on the SectorNet.
A pivotal data cluster is accessed.
